Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states

Class TurnState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states.TurnState
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateProdState, BaseProdInState, BaseProdOutState, BuyDevState, CardProdState, EndTurnState, ExtraProdOutState, FirstTurn, MarketState, MarketStrategyState, PlaceDevState, ProductionState, SelectionState
public abstract class TurnState
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the state reached by the player during his turn.

      public TurnState​(Controller controller)

  • Method Details

    • getController

      protected Controller getController()
      Returns:
      the controller that points to the specific game of this turn.

    • moveWarehouse

      public void moveWarehouse​(int fromShelf, int toShelf)
      It switches resources between the two shelves specified. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      fromShelf - shelf from the player wants to move resources
      toShelf - shelf to the player wants to move resources

    • moveExtraToWarehouse

      public void moveExtraToWarehouse​(int shelf, int leaderId, int quantityToMove)
      Parameters:
      shelf - specified shelf chosen to place the resources from the extraSlot
      leaderId - leaderCard's Id that offers the extra slot from which the resources are taken.
      quantityToMove - quantity of resources moved from the extra slot

    • moveWarehouseToExtra

      public void moveWarehouseToExtra​(int shelf, int leaderId, int quantityToMove)
      Parameters:
      shelf - specified shelf chosen to take resources
      leaderId - leaderCard's Id that offers the extra slot where the resources are put.
      quantityToMove - quantity of resources moved from the depot

    • activateLeaderCard

      public void activateLeaderCard​(int id)
      activate the specified leaderCard. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller.
      Parameters:
      id - leaderCard's ID

    • discardLeaderCard

      public void discardLeaderCard​(int id)
      discard the specified leaderCard. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      id - leaderCard's ID

    • goToMarket

      public void goToMarket​(java.lang.String direction, int position)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      direction - row || column
      position - row or column position

    • addStrategy

      public void addStrategy​(int id)
      select the market strategy offered by the specified leader card. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      id - leaderCard's ID

    • putWarehouse

      public void putWarehouse​(Resource resource, int shelf)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      resource - specified resource to place in depot.
      shelf - specified depot's shelf to place the resource.

    • putExtraSlot

      public void putExtraSlot​(Resource resource)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      resource - specified resource to place in an extraSlot.

    • discardRes

      public void discardRes​(Resource resource)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      resource - specified resource to discard.

    • buyDevCard

      public void buyDevCard​(Color color, int level, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> discountId)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      discountId - id of the leaderCard to buy.

    • pay

      public void pay​(Resource resource, java.lang.String position)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      resource - specified resource chosen for the payment.
      position - specified place from which the resource must be taken. Positions admitted are: 'extraSlot', 'depot' or 'strongbox'

    • placeDevCard

      public void placeDevCard​(int deck)
      place a dev card in the current player dashboard. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      deck - between 1 and 3

    • activateDevCard

      public void activateDevCard​(int deckIndex)
      Activate the production of the specified development card. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      deckIndex - index of the selected development card (from 1 to 3).

    • activateExtra

      public void activateExtra​(int id)
      activate the production power of the selected leader card. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the selected leaderCard.

    • selectOutput

      public void selectOutput​(Resource resource)
      Select the desired output of the selected production. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      resource - specified resource to take after the production.

    • activateBase

      public void activateBase()
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller

    • selectInput

      public void selectInput​(Resource res1, Resource res2)
      If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller
      Parameters:
      res1 - first resource to take as input for the production
      res2 - second resource to take as input for the production

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction()
      Activate the selected production. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller

    • end

      public void end()
      End the current player turn. It notify the controller to change the current player with the next player. If this method is performed during the wrong turn, it will send an error message to the controller

    • keepLeaderCards

      public void keepLeaderCards​(java.lang.String nickname, int id1, int id2)
      At the beginning of the game, this method is used to choose which leader cards the player wants to keep.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that did the choice.
      id1 - ID of a a specific leader card to keep.
      id2 - ID of a a specific leader card to keep.

    • selectResources

      public void selectResources​(java.lang.String nickname, Resource res1, Resource res2, int shelf1, int shelf2)
      At the beginning of the game, this method is used to choose which resources the player wants to put in depot.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that did the choice.
      res1 - specific resource to put in depot.
      res2 - additional resource to put in depot: if the player is not allowed to choose a second resource, set it to null.
      shelf1 - specific shelf to put the first resource.
      shelf2 - specific shelf to put the additional resource: if the player is not allowed to choose a second resource, set it to null.

    • completeTurn

      public abstract void completeTurn() throws GameEndedException
      complete the turn when the current player crashes.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • activateResCheat

      public void activateResCheat()
      cheat used during beta testing.

    • activateFaithCheat

      public void activateFaithCheat​(int steps)
      cheat used during beta testing: move the player by the specified steps.

    • endGame

      protected void endGame()
      starts the last phase of the game.
